verses.verse: וְאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei Now these were the sons דָויִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> do-Yid, of David אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נֽוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> no-lad- which were born ל֖וֹ lo בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-Ron; unto him in Hebron הַבְּכ֣וֹר׀ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor the firstborn אַמְנֹ֗ן <S%H550><s%> 'am-Non, Amnon לַאֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H293><s%> la-'a-chi-No-'am of Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔ית <S%H3159><s%> hai-yiz-re-'e-Lit, the Jezreelitess שֵׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> she-Ni the second דָּנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1840><s%> da-ni-Yel, Daniel לַאֲבִיגַ֖יִל <S%H26><s%> la-'a-vi-Ga-yil of Abigail הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽית׃ <S%H3762><s%> Hak-kar-me-Lit. the Carmelitess

הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi The third לְאַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H53><s%> le-'av-sha-Lom Absalom בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מַעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> ma-'a-Chah, of Maachah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter תַּלְמַ֖י <S%H8526><s%> tal-Mai of Talmai מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king גְּשׁ֑וּר <S%H1650><s%> ge-Shur; of Geshur הָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I the fourth אֲדֹנִיָּ֥ה <S%H138><s%> 'a-do-ni-Yah Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חַגִּֽית׃ <S%H2294><s%> chag-Git. of Haggith

הַחֲמִישִׁ֥י <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi The fifth שְׁפַטְיָ֖ה <S%H8203><s%> she-fat-Yah Shephatiah לַאֲבִיטָ֑ל <S%H37><s%> la-'a-vi-Tal; of Abital הַשִּׁשִּׁ֥י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi the sixth יִתְרְעָ֖ם <S%H3507><s%> yit-re-'Am Ithream לְעֶגְלָ֥ה <S%H5698><s%> le-'eg-Lah by Eglah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H802><s%> ish-To. his wife

שִׁשָּׁה֙ <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah [These] six נֽוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> no-lad- were born ל֣וֹ lo בְחֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> ve-chev-Ron, unto him in Hebron וַיִּ֨מְלָךְ־ <S%H4427><s%> vai-Yim-loch- and there he reigned שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, and there שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> ve-shish-Shah and six חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> cho-da-Shim; months וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim thirty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-lo-Vosh and three שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. and in Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These נוּלְּדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> nul-le-du- And these were born ל֖וֹ lo בִּירוּשָׁלָ֑יִם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-La-yim; unto him in Jerusalem שִׁ֠מְעָא <S%H8092><s%> me-'a Shimea וְשׁוֹבָ֞ב <S%H7727><s%> ve-sho-Vav and Shobab וְנָתָ֤ן <S%H5416><s%> ve-na-Tan and Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> u-she-lo-Moh and Solomon אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah, four לְבַת־ le-vat- שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H1340><s%> Shu-a' of Bathshua בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter עַמִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5988><s%> 'am-mi-'El. of Ammiel
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <S%H2984><s%> ve-yiv-Char Ibhar וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> ve-'e-li-sha-Ma' also and Elishama וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> ve-'e-li-Fa-let. and Eliphelet
וְנֹ֥גַהּ <S%H5052><s%> ve-No-gah And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <S%H5298><s%> ve-Ne-feg and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> ve-ya-Fi-a'. and Japhia

וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֧ע <S%H476><s%> ve-'e-li-sha-Ma' And Elishama וְאֶלְיָדָ֛ע <S%H450><s%> ve-'el-ya-Da' and Eliada וֶאֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <S%H467><s%> ve-'e-li-Fe-let and Eliphelet תִּשְׁעָֽה׃ <S%H8672><s%> tish-'Ah. nine

כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol All בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei [These were] all the sons דָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David מִלְּבַ֥ד <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad alone בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- beside the sons פִֽילַגְשִׁ֖ים <S%H6370><s%> fi-lag-Shim of the concubines וְתָמָ֥ר <S%H8559><s%> ve-ta-Mar and Tamar אֲחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tam. their sister פ Peh

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- son שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh And Solomon's רְחַבְעָ֑ם <S%H7346><s%> re-chav-'Am; [was] Rehoboam אֲבִיָּ֥ה <S%H29><s%> 'a-vi-Yah Abia בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> 'a-Sa Asa בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat Jehoshaphat בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son

יוֹרָ֥ם <S%H3141><s%> yo-Ram Joram בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son אֲחַזְיָ֥הוּ <S%H274><s%> 'a-chaz-Ya-hu Ahaziah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son יוֹאָ֥שׁ <S%H3101><s%> yo-'Ash Joash בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son

אֲמַצְיָ֧הוּ <S%H558><s%> 'a-matz-Ya-hu Amaziah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son עֲזַרְיָ֥ה <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Yah Azariah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son יוֹתָ֥ם <S%H3147><s%> yo-Tam Jotham בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son

אָמ֥וֹן <S%H526><s%> a-Mon Amon בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu Josiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No. his son

וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יֹאשִׁיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu, of Josiah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-chOr [were] the firstborn יוֹחָנָ֔ן <S%H3110><s%> yo-cha-Nan, Johanan הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni the second יְהוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim; Jehoiakim הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi the third צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H6667><s%> tzid-ki-Ya-hu, Zedekiah הָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I the fourth שַׁלּֽוּם׃ <S%H7967><s%> shal-Lum. Shallum

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יְהוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim; of Jehoiakim יְכָנְיָ֥ה <S%H3204><s%> ye-cha-ne-Yah Jeconiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son צִדְקִיָּ֥ה <S%H6667><s%> tzid-ki-Yah Zedekiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No. his son

וַחֲשֻׁבָ֡ה <S%H2807><s%> va-cha-shu-Vah And Hashubah וָ֠אֹהֶל <S%H169><s%> Va-'o-hel and Ohel וּבֶרֶכְיָ֧ה <S%H1296><s%> u-ve-rech-Yah and Berechiah וַֽחֲסַדְיָ֛ה <S%H2619><s%> va-cha-sad-Yah and Hasadiah י֥וּשַׁב Yu-shav חֶ֖סֶד <S%H3142><s%> Che-sed Jushabhesed חָמֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh. five
